review_text: Dustin’s place was perfect for a cozy stay on our roadtrip. It had everything we needed, was perfectly clean, the parking spot was right outside, and private. It was easy to check-in and comfortable! Couldn’t ask for a better spot to crash!
Perfect little spot to rest after a long drive. Super clean and comfortable, dog loved it too!
Perfect for the overnight stay while traveling through Nebraska

This was the perfect place to stop off the interstate for the night! Very clean and no weird smells. Dustin was clear and responsive with messaging. The back patio space is beautiful and shaded and it was nice sitting out there in the morning.

My boyfriend and I stayed here with our two dogs for a few days, and we really enjoyed the space. It is a tiny home, but they have maximized their space and it is extremely cozy. Definitely a cute little town and would recommend staying here if you’re passing through!
absolutely everything you need! lots of stores within walking distance, but quiet still. very thoughtfully decorated and cozy. my baby, dog and myself loved this little cottage
Dustin was a great host! His place was super clean, cute and cozy! He even left out bowls and treats for my dog. I would definitely stay here again!
Clean & cozy place, great directions & check-in instructions from Dustin. North Platte is a nice little town. Worth stopping.

My golden retriever and I had a perfect stay at this super clean, quiet spot on our road trip. The location was excellent - close to Rte 80 and stores, and Dustin's directions were very clear and easy to follow. I especially appreciated the full, well-stocked kitchen. Dog walks were easy around the neighborhood and Dustin even provided a few other suggestions for places to exercise my pup. I would absolutely stay here again!

Just did an overnight on my way through the area, was close to the freeway, food, gas and Walmart. Super cute, pretty quiet even though you're near a major street. Hot water on demand is always great!
Beautifully decorated above and beyond high end hotels.

What a nice tiny home to rest in. Dustin was great and communicative. I got delayed due to a blizzard and he was quick to respond and was nice enough to refund the night I had to cancel. I came in the next day and was glad to see a notebook with local suggestions. I had a delicious dinner at North 40 Chophouse and saw a little bit of North Platte. Everything was easy and the house has everything to make a stay comfortable & cozy!
This was a great stay! Cute little house with parking available off the street. I couldn’t fit my trailer unfortunately but my truck fit perfectly and we had a nice night.
I needed a quiet place to relax after a very long drive and the nest was just what I needed.

The "nest" is adorable. It was perfect for my husband and I - everything we needed. We got to see all of North Platte that we made the trip for and everywhere was easy to get to from the "nest". It was just like new! And it brought us good luck as we watches our Iowa State Cycylones mens basketball team rock to be Conference Champions!!!
Great little place with great communication from hosts. Would happily stay here again.

The place was clean and comfortable. We were able to make the meals we wanted in the kitchen. It had everything we needed. There is limited seating, even for two, but the listing was clear that it was for two people only. We would stay again and recommend to others. Dustin was very responsive and replied quickly. We were able to experience a lot of the sandhill crane migration during our stay.

Our stay at Noelle's Nest was wonderful! Super clean, comfortable bed, and lots of thoughtful touches. Perfect place for us to stay the night while traveling through North Platte. Quick and easy to find off of I80. Also appreciated that we could stay with our dog, Ollie. Friendly and proactive communication by Dustin. We hope to stay again on our travels!
Very cute place really close to a bunch of places to eat and a couple of blocks from the Walgreens. Easy to get to from the interstate. I'd definitely stay here again.
My boyfriend and I stayed here for a night during our road trip. The place was very clean and cozy, and they even left out treats for my kitties.
Great host and very comfy bed.
Great spot. Clean. Comfortable and a really helpful host.

We used Dustin’s place as a quick overnight stop on a roadtrip back home—it was perfect! The nest was convenient, easy-to-find, cozy and well-kept. Thank you for allowing our two dogs to stay; we would stay here over a hotel any day!
Great place to stay over on a roadtrip!

My husband and I passed through North Platte on a road trip and booked Noelle’s Nest last-minute. Dustin checked in with us right away to give us arrival details, and their place was updated, fresh, and cozy. The bed was super comfortable and we appreciated the extra touches (treats and dog bowls for our pup, snacks and coffee for us, and easy phone charger built into the nightstand). It’s close to everything in town and convenient, but also very quiet inside. We’d absolutely stay again if we find ourselves back in town!

This was the coziest and most beautiful home to stay in. Dustin is an amazing host!! Spotless, wonderful amenities and beautifully decorated. A terrible snow storm came through and he made sure there was a snow shovel and also informed us he would be by to shovel the walk. Being able to stay in such an amazing home allowed us to be with family for Christmas and that is priceless. Thank you Dustin and Noelle!!!!
Lovely home and very clean. Everything was in its place. Would stay here again.

This was a really great place to stay for a few days in North Platte. Although it is small, it really was the perfect size for 1 or 2 people and the layout was thoughtfully planned. Getting in was easy and the place was really cute and clean. The bed, pillows, and chair were all really comfortable. The kitchen had all of the necessities that I needed to cook for myself. I really appreciated how thoughtful Dustin was in providing pet dishes and a few treats for my pet. He also thought of his guests with coffee and a few snacks. The heater and tankless hot water heater both worked great and the instructions to use the Roku were clear. I would definitely recommend this place if you’re going to be in North Platte.
It was a nice little place that was clean and well cared for.
Never stayed in "tiny house" before . such a charmer!

This Tiny Home was so adorable. Everything we needed and then some. Kitchen and Bathroom was spotless. Appliances, pots, pans, like new or were new. I even took the wrappers off pans that had not been used, EVER. We enjoyed our stay. Our fur baby really enjoyed treats left by Dustin. You couldn't ask for anything better.

I must say that we were pleasantly surprised by the interior of the place. I was probably a little judgemental standing on the outside as it looked so small and I thought it was a shack. however, once the door opened I was amazed. it was so beautiful and done really well. the shower was amazing with never ending high pressure water. after a long day driving it was relief. if I could pick up this rental and put it in the middle of nowhere for hunting season, I would. very nice place and probably one of the best we have been to in a while now.
House was adorable, very cozy, and clean . I felt right at home. My stay was enjoyable and would gladly stay here again.

My daughter stopped here for a quick overnight on a road trip to Salt Lake. Dustin, was very responsive, I let him know she was arriving on the later side and he left a light on. The place was squeaky clean and very comfy. Thanks Dustin!
The place is freshly remodeled, cozy and clean. Easy to find and close to shopping & restaurants. We had a great stay and would definitely book again!

My wife, pooch, and I stayed at Noelle’s for one night on the way to Colorado for a long weekend. As the first guests of Dustin and Noelle, we can say their place is a fantastic AirBnB. Although small, it seemed spacious! The space was very well planned out, the bathroom was VERY nice and the entire place was immaculately clean. The location is close enough to the interstate that it is easy to find but not so far into town that it is away from restaurants and businesses. The dog park is only about a mile away as well. I would highly recommend staying here for traveling through or even if you are in North Platte for a visit. We are hoping we get the chance to stay again! Thanks for having us!
Grat host! Great stay@

The host was sooo nice and the place was very clean and comfortable. I was moving cross country with pets and the moving company made me arrive middle of the night. They were so sweet and responsive. I am soo grateful!

Mary’s place was a great stay in North Platte! 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, and a large kitchen/den area was perfect. Everything was clean and exactly what we needed for our stay. Mary was the best and made sure we were taken care of. During our stay, there was a tornado and Mary invited us to hang out in her basement until the storm passed!
Probably the best bnb option in north Platt to sleep 6+
Great stay! Will be back!
The place was nice, plenty of room for the group of us.
Such a great place for our family to stay!
Great Stay!
Would be nice to have end tables & master bedroom bed uncomfortable.

We got caught in a snowstorm on our way home to Colorado after Christmas. The interstate was shut down and we were panicked. We were able to book Mary’s place with our three dogs so quickly and we’re so incredibly grateful to be able to drop in on such short notice. It was such a lifesaver and we were so cozy in a very, otherwise, stressful situation. Thank you again for accommodating us!
Nice clean place to stay
Mary’s place is a great spot for families. We had 6 stay there comfortably. The walkway was shoveled for us before entry. Felt right at home. Great stay right off the interstate.
WE feel right at home.

Mary's Place: Host was easy to contact and very responsive. House had nice layout and was nicely decorated, easy access, nice neighborhood. However, needs to clearly let people know there is a 1st floor rental and basement rental because some people may not appreciate sharing same house or may want to rent both. Furniture is dated and could use more end tables/coffee tables. House was dirty and needed a good cleaning (EX: Dusty, counters dirty, animal hair on floor, appliances dirty inside and out, tubs/toilets washing machine dirty (Suggest cleaning service). Closets, one door broken and messy. Unused decorations just shoved under curio. Refrigerator didn't work but they did replace it promptly with new one. Stove on main floor had baked on food and digital panel didn't work so couldn't use. Shower floor a little slippery and could use some safety bars and better floor mats/towels/wash clothes and more toilet paper. Also had to share driveway with owners ( Inconvenient )
Great little home to stay.
Great place to stay. Host is very responsive. House is close to local attractions and clean. Nice back yard area.

Mary's place was a great place to stay. She gave clear instructions for check-in and how to locate things around the house. The house was very clean and spacious. It was very convenient that the house was pet friendly. There was plenty of yard space with a very green yard. Mary's place was in a very quaint area of town and a short drive from numerous restaurants and venues. I will definitely recommend people stay here and would stay again.
Mary's place was comfortable and in a quiet neighborhood. Perfect for my week visit to the area for work.

Mary was super kind and communicative! The area was easy to traverse and close to stores and restaurants! The kitchen was well stocked so we could easily cook during our stay! It was very comfortable and homey! The neighborhood was nice to walk our grandpuppy and the deck was really nice for a relaxing cup of coffee! We will go back again for sure!!!
nice house that is large and spacious with a well manicured front and back yard. we only stayed for the night traveling, but they had a very helpful late checkout. I would stay again.
Very nice

Clean, tidy, good neighborhood
Great host
Mary was great about keeping in touch, the place was nice and clean and would stay again
Nice place- great location
Mary was very friendly and responsive. Great house in a nice neighborhood.

Mary's place had a communicative host, easy to use lock, safe neighborhood, and free laundry. I come to North Platte frequently and usually stay at a hotel, but I couldn't find a hotel room for these dates, so decided I would try air b and b. This was my first air b and b experience and it makes me not want to use air b and b again. The furniture was very poor quality and uncomfortable, esp the beds and dining chairs. There was a great deal of trash under the king bed. There was trash on the floor near the trash can in the kitchen to include cigarettes. There is a sign not to smoke and we do not smoke, but the house smelled like cigarettes and cats. In fact, there was a cat at the back patio constantly scratching, and making noise, and climbing on the screens. The hand soap was running out in the bathrooms. There were small bars of soap provided, but the towels were very small and thin. The bathrooms were extremely dingy and dirty with hair and grime on all surfaces and dirty rugs.
Had a nice, relaxing stay!

The place was perfect! It was very clean and in a very good location. We were just passing through and needed a place for one night and this was a great choice. Would definitely recommend staying here!
Spacious living space, and very good location.
Enjoyed our stay
This is a perfect place with lots of space.

Mary's Place was everything we expected. The yard was well manicured. The house was very nice with modern appliances and wide open spaces. The master bathroom had a beautiful walk-in shower. the home was very accommodating to all of our needs. we will definitely book here again on our next stop in the area. thank you for sharing your home.

super cute and homey feeling to this home. All the kids had a great time with the huge backyard and the games in the cabinet. Neighborhood is quiet. Mary is so sweet and always very easy to get a hold of! When I come back to North Platte, I will definitely try and get this verbo again.
My family of 6 found this fit our needs quite well. Very convenient, and Mary was a good host.
Had a great stay at Mary’s

Our family of 5 stayed there for 4 days. It was a comfortable stay. Just wish we would of known we didn't have the whole house. Their were guests also staying in the basement. The laundry area was a shared space, which wasn't a huge deal. Like I sadi, just wish it would of been disclosed to us
Very nice place
Mary was so sweet and super helpful! I loved the warm spacious home! It was exactly what we wanted! I will definitely be staying for a visit again!
Mary’s Place is in a nice neighborhood with easy access to Walmart, down town and near by restaurants. I appreciate the fact that the beds were nice size and plenty of them.
It was a great place!!
Nice house, great for what we needed! Would stay here again for sure!
It is a beautiful and very comfortable house. I would definitely return. Thank you for your hospitality.
Great house to stay Mary is a great host

Mary's Place is in a great location with most restaurants, grocery stores, visitor's center, etc. nearby. Quiet neighborhood and the home is a good size for 4-6 people. We stayed there to watch the Sandhill Crane migration and it was perfect.
Great place to stay. Could’ve been a little cleaner.
Our second time renting from Mary for a Thanksgiving stay! Hopefully again next year!
It is a beautiful house, excellent location, Mary is a wonderful person
A nice place to stay. It was clean, plenty of room. Good location
Very big and clean!
Cozy, clean and just lovely!!!! Mary and her husband are simply amazing and I cannot highly recommend them enough!!!!! Great stay, great house, very clean and very cozy!!!!
Great price house was clean and communication was great. Would definitely stay again.
this place is very spaciuos and very nice . We enjoyed cooking in the kitchen and hanging out on the patio . this place has everything you could ask for .

Overall, the stay was good. There are also guests that stay in the lower level of the house but we never heard anyone. The house was decently clean. My suggestion would be to fold linens neater. It sounds nitpicky, but presentation means a lot. All the linens were just kind of thrown in the cabinets. There was also someone’s contact lens in the kitchen sink. A baby bottle top was left in the master bedroom. The bed slept well. No real issues.
Great location. Large house. Lots of sitting room. Beautiful fixtures!
Really nice house and a great places to stay! I recommend it 100%
Mary’s home is spacious and welcoming. We very much appreciated having so much space for our family to relax to break up our 15 hour drive to Utah for work! We would definitely stay again!
Great house, great host, great stay! this is a gem in North Platte!

Our children stayed in the Airbnb and they have always had good ratings and stayed in other Airbnb’s in the past. They said it was spacious and modern and the beds were OK. The only problem was it had not been clean very well. There were crumbs on top of the stove ,open containers in the refrigerator, pubic hair on the shower ,poop stains on the toilet and sticky spotty marks on the floor.
Very nice place to stay. I would definitely recommend it.

Breakfast is not included. Location was good, as there’s not much between Denver and Lincoln Nebraska. Short notice, was no problem. I did specifically ask about breakfast, and although the listing says it’s included, it’s not
great relaxing place
Easy check in, comfortable accommodations.

Nice place, a little stressful to be on the top level with young kids, we worried about disturbing the guests below as the floors creaked and kids are kids. Cleanliness was decent, not outstanding. Also, didn’t have carbon monoxide detector, at least that we could find. Would consider staying again but didn’t blow us away.
Large, comfortable home! The hot water was plentiful. Mary has a later checkout than most places, so this is a great stop if you need some extra rest on a long road trip.
My family liked it here, cozy house and cozy quiet neighborhood but also just a short drive to the main area of town. Great value and definitely better than a hotel!
We stayed for the New Year again. We had a nice stay.
Great home in a nice area. The home had nice appliances and furnishings that made for a very comfortable stay.
Nice place
Will be back

Wonderful space. Safe neighborhood. Beautiful deck space with bbq grill access. Loved sitting on deck and watching squirrels and rabbits in the gorgeous green lawn.
Perfect location is close to everything! Hosts will let you know where all the best of everything is!
Great to have attentive hosts. Great people
Mary’s place was so cozy, with all the comforts of home! This is our second stay in one of her units. Definitely recommend!
Perfect spot for our work trip!
This was a wonderful rental. It was a very nice place to stay and the owners were very accommodating. We would definitely stay there again.

Stunningly beautiful home with everything you need! Master bedroom wonderful with attached bathroom/shower. 2 additional rooms are also large and comfortable. Seating galore and all comfortable! Wish we had more time here it was wonderful!
We had an excellent stay in North Platte! House was great for all we needed including bedrooms and kitchen.
Very nice & clean home! Very homey feeling!

Nice 3 bedroom, 2 bed house. Home has comfy couches, basic kitchen amenities, and decent beds. The basement of the house is also rented out, so keep in mind there may be other guests on the property. Overall it was an ok place to stay a night.
Great stop along our trip, close to food and shopping we needed to do.
It was an entire Home! great stay
Nice place.
Quick replies, and nice place.
Easy access and nice home. I would stay here again.

We stayed at Mary’s place for one night traveling as a family. The house was nice and had everything we needed for our short stay. Basically everything was in order but we had to vacuum the couch because there were chip crumbs all over it and the kitchen/dining room floor was not swept or mopped.
We also were not aware that it was a shared unit with people staying in the downstairs below. Overall they were quiet, but when they accessed their unit, we could hear them talking quite clearly through the shared laundry room.

This was the perfect home away from home for me and my family. Mary's Place accommodated my father, my brother, sister in law, and their 3 children. Dad was able to have a private room and bathroom just like at home. It was great to discover a pack and play crib for my lil nephew, which came in handy for taking downstairs to Homey Place where the rest of our family stayed.
Great place! Clean, perfect for 4 guys who were just passing through on a golf trip.

The house was spacious and had room for our family, so that was great! Our first night was a bit of scare as we were not use to tornado like weather and winds getting up to 80 miles an hour and electricity going out. it would be nice to have an emergency plan available. But overall after the first night the rest of our stay was great and comfortable as we were in and out of the house.

Pros- spacious, beautiful back yard to relax and kids were able to run around in it was clean, nice lawn that had great maintenance which made us comfortable having the kids running around. Mary was quick with responses and flexible on check in and check out times. Loved that she had satellite tv to watch, it’s rare to see this and appreciate it. Nice shower in the master. Great quiet neighborhood.
Cons- bedding did smell of smoke and towels are old and hard. In need of new items. No soaps or shampoos for showers. Thankfully no one was staying in the basement during our stay but did not like that I was not aware that it was a shared place when booking.
We travel a lot, Of all the air bnbs we have stayed at it was on the top of our list and would stay again if we ever came through the area again.
This was a great place to stay very comfortable and room for everyone.
We had a great stay! Very clean and great location.
Clean home. Quiet subdivision.

Rental is Not entire house, it is upper and lower floor rentals with a shared washer and dryer. Also, main sectional couch upstairs has been around heavy smoking and smells awful from it. Otherwise decent rental.

This was my first time renting an Airbnb. Lots of space for two families. Nice location. I was under the impression that we got the whole house so was surprised to see a sign that said the basement was rented also. I never did see or hear anyone but it made me a little uneasy when I got there the first night with just myself and my two daughters because there was a door to the basement right in the front room. Unfortunately, the sectional smelled like smoke and my allergies flared up. The one room also smelled a little funky. Beds were ok. Overall it was a great price point and a lot of room. Just a few little fixes and it would be even better!
Large space. Clean. Easy check-in. Good communication. Great location.
Thank You

Mary's Place is a beautiful home inside and out. Location is perfect . We rented it for some family that was coming into town for Graduation party/memorial day and it was perfect. Spacious enough and quiet neighborhood.
this was a very relaxing place. we enjoyed it while we were in town.

This was a perfect spot! We were on our way to visit family and the spacious living area paired with the grassy back yard was the perfect break. My children loved running around outside and it was just what we needed before the next leg of our trip! The beds were comfortable and Mary was very friendly!

Mary’s place is a spacious, cozy home with unique decor. Plenty of room for a family with children or several adults! Kitchen has a very functional layout. Extremely easy checkin and checkout. Great location. Overall, if your needing a great home to stay in while in North Platte... this is the place!
This is a great house in a nice neighborhood. Everything worked well. I'd definitely stay again. North Platte is an easy place to get around. The house was nice and quiet.
Clean, pleasant, quiet. Good stay
Mary is one of the nicest people you will ever meet.

When a Person comes to a place like North Platte for the weekend they are looking for a place to stay that resembles the comfor of their own home. Mary’s home was just that.
The master shower with the rain down shower head was a real treat. For a second as I washed my hair I thought I was outside in the rainforests of Indonesia. Not to mention that infinity shower drain. Decccent shower pan!!! I Respect the craftsmanship kid.
Now I will say I did show up to the house a little intoxicated for my stay. And as I stumbled to the couch I saw a book of genius book of world records on the end table. Absolutely amazing!! I got lost in that for 45 mins.
The stay was amazing. A 5 out of 5, the pie, the whip cream, and the cherry!! I’ll be back to north platte and I’ll be back to Mary’s place.
Mary was so accommodating to our needs and even brought us a cup of flour that we forgot while making dinner. This is a great place to spend an overnight or a whole weekend!
Great location to North Platte Hospital. Very familiar home.
Large and comfortable bed, upscale kitchen and bathrooms. Feels more like a home than a rental.

Mary's place is clean and inviting. The living area is open to the kitchen with plenty of seating. The kitchen was big enough to have two to three people working in it. It has everything you would need. It is a warm and cozy place. The three bedrooms were a must for us. The bathrooms were decorated very nicely with good showers, always had plenty of hot water. There is a nice deck off the eating area. It's in a nice neighborhood. We were able to walk(50+ degrees in December) and everyone spoke to us. There is off street parking. We would stay there again.

Nice house but very dirty! Toilet seat was dirty, edge of the bathtub was dusty with hair on it. Bed sheets were had human hairs all over them. Bed blankets had dirty spots on them. Kitchen rug was filthy, didn’t even seem vacuumed.
you may want to provide clean sheets and bed covers.
A great spot to pit stop on our way to Steamboat. Left at 10 central time the next morning & rolled into Steamboat while it was still light. Plenty of space for us and our 3 grown kids.
Very comfortable and spacious house. Furnishings and decor just like home. Warm and cozy during extreme cold weather. Plenty hot water in baths. House had everything we wanted.

Mary’s house is spacious with an extremely comfortable living room. The location was perfect for us being close to the highway and also close to a cool shopping district with a great ice cream parlor. Mary checked on us immediately upon our arrival to see if there was anything we needed. Great value for the money.
Great place!! And so much to do with kids nearby! Great communication with host. Highly recommend!
Great place to stay in North Platte. Will definitely be back.

Spent a week in mid October. Wonderful place to relax. Had a great time enjoying morning coffee on deck porch looking at the rabbits in the beautiful grass.
Great space; three bedrooms and two bathrooms. Rain shower head in master.
Two separate sitting areas.
Great lighting. Quiet neighborhood
Nice space and great hosts.
Great place for an overnight. A bit dirty and the towels were “crispy” and smelled funky.
Great place. Was perfect location as we were travelling east, very close to the freeway. Modern amenities and very clean

This house is just as nice as other reviews suggest! It was a welcome respite during a long drive from CO to the east coast. Clean, welcoming, comfortable and easy. Thanks to Mary for being a great host.
Very nice house, furnishings and decor, great place for a family to stay. We were impressed with the quietness, even though in town.
Had a great experience - thank you!
Mary was great! Only there for a night on a road trip, but local area is cute and the house amenities were awesome
Great place!
The location was easy to find, and the host was quick with communication! Perfect for our quick night stay on our way through.
Mary's place was just great, warm and welcoming. We will be back!
Clean and stylish house. Was great for a family of 5 passing through town!
Mary’s place is a good stopover on the way to or from the Rocky Mountains. The house is easy to find, right off I-80. It is bigger than I was expecting.

This house was lovely! It was obvious that a lot of work has been put into each room. The bedrooms, living area, and kitchen were so spacious and were perfect for our family. I highly recommend this house!

Very easy to access; pictures are exactly as the place is
Large amount of space and convenient for our travel purposes as we were passing through on the way to Colorado.
Good size place and convenient to the highway and everything in town you would need to get to.
Great location, plenty of space, awesome kitchen. Neighborhood was safe and we were able to take a nice walk after our travels. It noted that breakfast was included but we weren’t able to find it.
Mary's place is much better than her photos look. The kitchen and living areas are stylish and comfortable. The entire place was clean and comfortable.

This space is SOOOOO cute and comfy. I kidd you not, I didnt know it would have been as good as it was. The photos do NOT do it justice. It's so thoughtful and has everything you need! Very spacious and perfect for a LONG (or short) stay! So sorry we couldnt stay longer!! Highly recommend. :)
Great space.
Great place in North Platte with awesome hosts!

Stayed at Mary’s place for one night on the way home from a road trip.
Mary was hospitable and the house was in a convenient location.
Would definitely stay there again!

Okay place -- decent location not too far from I-80. Mary is quick to reply and easy to work with.
There is a note that people are occupying the basement, which was not expected and a bit stressful for us with the kids, but we never heard or saw anyone while there (we stayed two separate nights).
This is a lovely place to stay. There is lots of space, the kitchen facilities are excellent and it's a very comfortable place to stay.
Had an excellent stay at Mary’s place. The space was clean and comfortable.; the location convenient. There were some dead light bulbs but otherwise all was great. Thanks!
Great location from highway. A good layout - one level, no stairs for my toddler. Clean and spacious.
We loved staying at Mary’s!
A very comfortable place to stay. Owner was nice and the deck is great to relax on

The house was well laid out in a quiet part of town. If you're going to cook this is the place to do it. The kitchen is well appointed and there is also a grill! Mary and her husband live right next door so are very prompt with any concerns. They are delightful people!
We were very happy with our stay and will stay again.
Very clean and quiet. Plenty of room for families!
Great place for a family with young kids. And very hospitable, communicative hosts!
I enjoyed staying at Mary's place and would highly recommend it. It is located in a quiet neighborhood and was very clean and comfortable.
Great place to stay in North Platte, very convenient and easy to find!
Good value. Clean. Very quiet. Love the kitchen. Soft beds
Great location. Neighborhood is quiet.
The house was okay. Not up to my standard of cleanliness.
Great location...great price great kitchen

This place an awesome treasure to find as such a well prepared place to stay for 6 of us. So much room and every amenity we could think of to make our transition trip as smooth as possible. Mary communicated splendidly. We appreciated all the personal touches.
Don’t hesitate; book this, if available.
The stay was great, especially for the price. I would stay here again.
Great stay! Would do it again!

I did not have the entire place to myself: Someone came in the home at 6:45 a.m. in the morning when I was still there, which was terrifying! Also, the home is quite musty and the towels provided really need to be retired.

Mary’s home was beautiful, and she and her husband were so kind and helpful to our family. If it weren’t for social distancing we probably would have seen and talked to them more. 😉
Our kids loved the house and for some reason all three of them wanted the blue room.
We had a peaceful night’s sleep. I definitely recommend this place.

Mary’s place is very easy to access off of the Interstate and is close to places to eat. It is also in a very quiet neighborhood. We didn’t stay long because this was a work-related overnight, but it would be a comfortable place to spend some time with family or friends.
Mary’s place with clean and exactly as described. Mary was an easy to work with host and we rested easy at her place.
Solid
Stayed again for the holidays. Had a good time.
Nice spacous rooms, open floor plan, was able to host amd cook Christmas dinner for 6 adults and 10 kids without feeling cramped!!
Great place to stay. We were impressed with our stay. Thanks Mary.
Lots of space and majority of place was very clean and extremely well stocked with thoughtful things ..Very nice dishwasher but we just couldn’t figure out how to use it.

Mary and her husband Richard are truly two of the nicest people I have ever met. They are caring and kind and are exceptional hosts. North Platte has been wonderful because of them. Their home is beautiful and I would recommend this home to anyone. They will honestly be friends that I will keep in touch with as I continue my travels. ❤️

What a great stay! For the same cost as a local hotel room, my 2 friends and I each got our own bedroom, 2 bathrooms, and a great relaxing space to hang out in. Mary was very prompt with any questions or concerns we had. We'll be back!

If it's available, THIS is where I stay when I go back to NP. Period! There's nothing better than having a morning coffee on the patio, inhaling the fresh air and watching nature do its thing. It is a mental and physical recharge cubed.
perfect spot to have for a few days, very clean and has everything you need, excellent location as well
Loved the place. Great communication, super clean and would stay here again.

Such a great place when visiting pals for a date night!
Would stay again and recommend to others!
This place was perfect for a weekend getaway. Will definitely be back again!

Always a great stay! Cabin was very clean and super cozy. Thanks for everything!

Mendy's place was so cool... a serene private cottage feel, surrounded by trees and walking distance to Pal's brewery. Iwould definitely book this place againif I'm ever I'm town.

Everything was great! Mendy was very responsive and helpful answering all my questions before our stay. The house was very clean and cozy. My husband and I had a very enjoyable stay here! It was a quick overnight and the home was perfectly located along our route. Entry was very easy and it was stocked with all of the basic necessities. North Platte itself has fun shopping and restaurants.

Having stayed at SO many homes that were in wooded areas this is the ONLY place we’ve stayed in; a beautiful area such as this, surrounded by trees that has been completely immaculate! Every corner in the home is absolutely spotless! We were so impressed and pleased with our stay!

very convenient cottage just a quick walk to their great brewery; our family of four slept comfortably and had a nice, peaceful evening after visiting the brewery!

I really hate to write this, as you can tell they have put a lot of work into the place and did many things to make the place inviting (like a North Platte information binder), but I would not recommend staying here, primarily for safety reasons. We had some tidiness issues (not folded towels and linens, old, misshapen pillows, dirty coffee cups) but those could have been one-off oversights or us being too picky. The main issue is the fire safety. Most critically, there is no window in the main bedroom. The other windows in this basement suite are all above your head (we didn't measure but I'd guess the sill is about 6 feet off the ground). I looked up Nebraska code and each sleeping area should have a window that is no more than 44" off the ground and has at least 5sqft of opening for above grade openings. With the window opened they might have that 5sqft but definitely not the 44 inches above the floor. We stayed there with my elderly in-laws. I don't know if I could have heaved myself up to those windows if the need had arisen, let alone my in-laws.

BEWARE: This was by far the worst Airbnb experience I have ever had and I've traveled and stayed at Airbnbs all over the US including Hawaii, several times.
We arrived at the house and it was 79° inside, we learned later on that not all of the vents work and at 9 pm it was still 75° in the house , we were in a heat advisory also. We were under the impression that this was a single unit, buy quickly learned otherwise when a stranger came to the door and started to try to get in. The only thing separating the upstairs from the downstairs is a laundry room door and there are vents from the kitchen to the laundry open that are open and we can see through them and hear everything. We messaged the host to ask if there was another unit that other people were staying in and said they said yes. When we told them that the listing didn't state that it was two units, they told us we could leave.
Over the next hour or so we found that the Airbnb was dirty. There was a fake eyelash stuck to the couch, dirty dishes put back in the cupboards, the bathroom towels and rugs were crunchy and dirty, and there were used bars of soap in the bathrooms. Once bathroom toilet had been sprayed with blue bathroom cleaner but never wiped down so there were just dried up blue streaks all over the toilet. There was literally trash left behind up other people that no one bothered to clean up.
We started looking at other reviews that were more recent since we booked this 3 months in advance and learned that other people had not so pleasant stays, and not so pleasant interactions with the host. Given that our first interaction with the host wasn't great, we decided not to message them again.
The next day, we were at the parade in town and we received a text that they were kicking us out and we needed to come get our stuff. We arrived shortly after and found that the hosts had gone through our stuff and threw a bunch of it in a pile on the floor and then wouldn't let us collect the rest of our belongings. They literally trapped one of us on the porch blocking the door way and we ended up having to call the police for assistance. They kept saying that we did nothing but complain the entire night before and that no one can afford to travel anymore and everyone is just looking for a free place to stay, but at least they got paid for one nights stay. After leaving and going to a hotel for the night, we learned that not only had they gone through our stuff, but they threw the trash that someone else left behind inside one of the suitcases and stole a bottle of perfume.
Video and photo documentation was sent to Airbnb support, and the support team was amazing to work with, but this place and these people are not worth it!!

We had good contact with the host on when we could check in. When we got there it wasn't clean. Bathrooms were dirty and had hair and dirt in the showers. There were food crumbs on kitchen counters, couch, and floors. Stovetop was dirty. Hosts husband started to clean but when i asked if the beds were clean (considering nothing else was), he said "he wasn't going to deal with this and we could go find somewhere else to stay." He said he would call his wife and refund my money because we weren't staying there. I was Not very happy!! Now 5 people had to find other accommodations at a motel for 2 nights.

Unfortunately, the initial contact went well however things went awry towards the end. Through a number of emails I expressly let the host know that I needed a specific checkout date and could I get that. She assured me that everything was good however after arriving and staying two days we were literally kicked out on Sunday because the host allowed an overbooking for Sunday night. My things were moved to the garage while we were out at a family function. There were 6 of us already in the house that were suppose to have been there Friday, Saturday and Sunday. There were only two people coming for one night and we were obviously overbooked. So instead of accommodating and not displacing a group of six (already settled in for one more night), they chose to kick us out to accommodate a couple staying for one night. We had discussed with the host and her husband how we might fix this and while the husband did say that they would work something out, they opted to simply put ALL of our stuff in a pile in the garage. My whole family were extremely upset and forced to get a hotel for our last night in town. Seems the confusion was on the side of the host but we got the raw end of the deal.
